mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMIN_RESERVATION ( RESERVE_ID, MEAL_TIME, RESERVE_DATE, TIME_SLOT, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( ADMIN_RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mealTime}, TO_DATE(#{reserveDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{timeSlot}, SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT CUSTOMER_ID AS customerId, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, SEAT_ID AS seatId FROM CUSTOMER_RESERVATION WHERE RESERVE_ID = ( SELECT RESERVE_ID FROM ADMIN_RESERVATION WHERE RESERVE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TIME_SLOT = #{time} )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification (notification_id, customer_id, message, is_read, created_at) VALUES (seq_notification_id.NEXTVAL, #{customerId}, #{content}, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
